shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the publisher's transcoding is updated.

section.p: This method is deprecated, please use instead.
Reports the result of calling the \ref IRtcEngine::addPublishStreamUrl "addPublishStreamUrl" method. (CDN live only.)

pd.p:
@param error Error code: #ERROR_CODE_TYPE. Main errors include:
#ERR_OK (0): The publishing succeeds.
#ERR_FAILED (1): The publishing fails.
#ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT (-2): Invalid argument used. If you do not call configuration before calling, the SDK will call back ERR_INVALID_ARGUMENT.
#ERR_TIMEDOUT (-10): The publishing timed out.
#ERR_ALREADY_IN_USE (-19): The chosen URL address is already in use for CDN live streaming.
#ERR_ENCRYPTED_STREAM_NOT_ALLOWED_PUBLISH (130): You cannot publish an encrypted stream.
ERR_PUBLISH_STREAM_CDN_ERROR (151): CDN related error. Please call the method to delete the original streaming address, and then call the method to push to the new address again.
ERR_PUBLISH_STREAM_NUM_REACH_LIMIT (152): The number of push addresses of a single anchor reaches the upper limit of 10. Delete the unnecessary URLs before adding new ones.
ERR_PUBLISH_STREAM_NOT_AUTHORIZED (153): Operate streams that are not owned by the host, such as updating the stream parameters of other hosts and stopping other hostsâ€™ streams. Please check your app logic.
`LIVE_STREAMING_INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR`: An error occurs in Agora's streaming server. Please call to push the stream again.
ERR_PUBLISH_STREAM_FORMAT_NOT_SUPPORTED (156): The format of the push stream address is incorrect. Please check the format.
